recipes.label: Hint: A Beckoning Performance: Not Enough
recipes.startdescription: There is something here, but I cannot quite reach it. If I could stage a performance with a stronger tie to Knock.

recipes.previewdescription: With notes that play that pierce the heart, mind and soul as once, I can summon forth emotion from the audience which they had locked in secret places. It can be used to summon the things from the fraying edges of the world to me as well.
recipes.label: Perform a Show laced with the Intent of Knock
recipes.startdescription: I play until my fingers bleed, my eyes water and my tongue feels close to tearing. I can see the hundred pairs of eyes staring at me; opened wide, open doors.
Now comes the time for me to channel this energy into whatever target I desire.

slots.label: Direction
slots.description: Now that my Intent is set, I have to set my Direction. What do I wish to affect?
